trans-unit.note: Shown when user adds a card; Edit Old Screen, Edit Screen

trans-unit.source: AnkiMobile was written by Damien Elmes and Richard Smith, and is based off Damien's work on the computer version of Anki.
To start automatically advancing, use the 'Auto Advance' action.
Some related or buried cards were delayed. They will be shown in a future study session, or you can %@
The front of this card is blank.
Please ensure your clock is set to the correct date and time, then try again.
Please check that you are running the latest version of AnkiMobile.
Your collection is corrupt. Please post on the support site for help.
To study outside of the normal schedule, you can use %@
Deleting this options group will prevent any changes from being merged from other devices on the next sync. Proceed?
Error playing audio. This can be caused by a corrupt file, a file iOS does not support (eg .ogg), or an mp3 file incorrectly named .wav
Force a one way sync? All changes on one side will be lost.
If a previous sync failed, please try again in a few minutes.
AnkiMobile is built with %@, generously shared by the developer community.

There are more new cards available, but the daily limit has been reached. You can increase the limit in the options, but please bear in mind that the more new cards you introduce, the higher your short-term review workload will become.
Night mode darkens the interface, and displays cards as white on black.
Your collection couldn't be loaded. Please restore from an automatic backup via the preferences screen.

trans-unit.note: no tags selected; Custom Study Screen

trans-unit.source: does not appear to be a valid http/https link.
trans-unit.note: (http://example.com) does not appear to be...; Download Manager

trans-unit.source: Overwrite entire collection with imported file? This action can not be undone.
Please go to Privacy>Microphone in your device's settings, and allow Anki to access the microphone.
To return all cards at once, swipe over the blue deck in the deck list, and delete it.
trans-unit.note: Custom Study Screen, Filtered Deck Screen

trans-unit.source: Revert to %@? Any changes made since the backup will be lost.
Today's review limit has been reached, but there are still cards waiting to be reviewed. For optimum memory, consider increasing the daily limit in the options.

Your decks here and on AnkiWeb differ in such a way that they can't be merged together, so it's necessary to overwrite the decks on one side with the decks from the other. Do you want to upload the decks from here, or download the decks from AnkiWeb?
Your collection is in an inconsistent state. Please use the Check Database function, then try again.
To activate syncing, tap the synchronize button on the deck list screen.
A big thanks to everyone who has provided translations, bug reports, and suggestions.
Thank you for buying AnkiMobile! Anki development would not be able to continue without your support, so it is greatly appreciated.
Cards will be returned to their original deck as you answer them.
trans-unit.note: Custom Study Screen, Filtered Deck Screen
